contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The petition for allowance of appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently filed; said dismissal is without prejudice to any rights petitioner may have pursuant to the Post Conviction Relief Act.
The petition to withdraw as counsel is remanded for disposition to the Court of Common Pleas of Westmoreland County.
. Act of April 13, 1988 P.L. 336, No. 47 § 3.
